verse:
यो ब्रह्माणं विदधाति पूर्वं यो वै वेदांश्च प्रहिणोति तस्मै।
तह देवंआत्मबुद्धिप्रकाशं मुमुक्षुर्वै शरणमहं प्रपद्ये॥
निष्कलं निष्क्रिय शान्तं निरवद्यं निरञ्जनम्‌।
अमृतस्य पर सेतुं दग्धेन्दनमिवानलम्‌॥
meaning: Verse 1:यो ब्रह्माणं विदधाति पूर्वं यो वै वेदांश्च प्रहिणोति तस्मै।This verse can be broken down as follows:Meaning:He who fully understands and imparts knowledge of the Supreme Absolute (Brahman) and the Vedas beforehand, to him...Verse 2:तह देवं आत्मबुद्धिप्रकाशं मुमुक्षुर्वै शरणमहं प्रपद्ये॥This verse can be broken down as follows:Meaning:Therefore, I surrender myself to that divine being who illuminates the knowledge of the self and is the refuge of those seeking liberation. Verse 3:Meaning:Like a bridge that scorches a burnt down forest, this Supreme Being is indivisible, inactive, peaceful, faultless, uncontaminated, and beyond the impermanence of material existence.
